channel.title: Fashion on Alex's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Fashion on Alex's Blog

item.title: [Initial Impressions] The Shoe Mart: Alden Ravello Indys
item.description: Alden Ravello Indy boots from The Shoe Mart Background As many know, getting on a list for rare colors of Alden shell can be difficult and once you’re on a list there are tales of people waiting upwards of 3-5 years for a chance to buy the shoes they want. I seem to have lucked out a bit. I got on The Shoe Mart’s (TSM) list back in December of 2018 and got the email that I was at the front of the line for a model I was interested in in early June of this hellish year.

item.title: $275 Starter Pack - Ivy Edition
item.description: I saw /u/silkk_’s starter pack here and was inspired to put together a version of what I wear almost every day. This one is a bit more expensive, but I think the individual pieces are priced well and worth it. This is a baseline to get you started. Many would say that a navy blazer is required for this to truly be an Ivy guide and I’m inclined to agree. For the sake of the budget though I’m keeping it simple.
